lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: A BOOGIE! That's right, we've got another pal joining us today!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: They love to jam out, but don't get caught in their far out waves, man!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: He's done it! Nuck Chorris has done it!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: What a show, what a spectacle! I've never heard this place so lively!

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: Well, now that you've exhausted all of our warriors...

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: I suppose we should get you home so you can keep making those movies we love to watch.

lines.name: Commentator
lines.text: But do visit us sometime, will ya?
